name: Uncalled Night
description:
You woke up in an abandon floor with lots of rooms and ofcourse with a flashlight. However This floor is full of ghosts and souls and scary elements !!!! 

Your Goal is to find a way out of this crazy maze before the Time Runs out and don't get scared with the Jumpscares at every turn. 

Don't get lost and remember your way...

Controls

WASD - for movement

Hold Shift - to run 

Spacebar - to jump 

**Headphones are required for better sound experience**

Credits

Ghoul model was taken from asset store.

Other models were used from sketchfab.

Sounds were used from freesound.org

Download Instructions

1. Download zip

2. Extract zip

3. Play the Game and Enjoy!!

*PS : This is my first Horror Game  created by me and I know it's not a perfect scary game but I will surely improve my skills in future.
